metadata.Title: CVE-2017-3204 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: The Go SSH library (x/crypto/ssh) by default does not verify host keys,facilitating man-in-the-middle attacks. Default behavior changed in commite4e2799 to require explicitly registering a hostkey verification mechanism.

criterions.comment: golang-go.crypto: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
